frontmatter.title: Azure Active Directory (AAD)
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for Azure Active Directory (AAD)
frontmatter.howItWorks: Federate with any external identity provider
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Azure AD workload identity authentication method replaces pod-managed identity, which integrates with the Kubernetes native capabilities to federate with any external identity providers on behalf of the application.
featureList: Use Azure Active Directory pod-managed identities in Azure Kubernetes Service.
A maximum of 200 pod-managed identities are allowed for a cluster.
Pod-managed identities are available on Linux node pools only.
